welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Buhl, Germany! Get ready to experience the charming beauty of this city known for its rich history, stunning landscapes, and warm hospitality. Explore and enjoy all that Buhl has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Karlsruhe/Baden-Baden Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for charter and low-cost flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Black Forest Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal handles all freight and logistics operations at Black Forest Airport.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
